verses.verse: And I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> out of the <S%G3485>temple<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels,<s%> <S%G5217>Go<s%> your ways, and <S%G1632>pour<s%> out the <S%G5357>vials<s%> of the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

And the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G565>went,<s%> and <S%G1632>poured<s%> out his <S%G5357>vial<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth;<s%> and there <S%G1096>fell<s%> a <S%G2556>noisome<s%> and <S%G4190>grievous<s%> <S%G1668>sore<s%> on the <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G5480>mark<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> and on them which <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> his <S%G1504>image.<s%>

And the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G1632>poured<s%> out his <S%G5357>vial<s%> on the <S%G2281>sea;<s%> and it <S%G1096>became<s%> as the <S%G129>blood<s%> of a <S%G3498>dead<s%> man: and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> in the <S%G2281>sea.<s%>

And the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G1632>poured<s%> out his <S%G5357>vial<s%> on the <S%G4215>rivers<s%> and <S%G4077>fountains<s%> of <S%G5204>waters;<s%> and they <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G129>blood.<s%>

And I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G5204>waters<s%> <S%G3004>say,<s%> You <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> O <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1488>are,<s%> and <S%G2258>were,<s%> and shall be, <S%G3754>because<s%> you have <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G5023>thus.<s%>

For they have <S%G1632>shed<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G40>saints<s%> and <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> and you have <S%G1325>given<s%> them <S%G129>blood<s%> to <S%G4095>drink;<s%> for they are <S%G514>worthy.<s%>

And I <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> out of the <S%G2379>altar<s%> <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G3483>Even<s%> <S%G3483>so,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3841>Almighty,<s%> <S%G228>true<s%> and <S%G1342>righteous<s%> are your <S%G2920>judgments.<s%>

And the <S%G5067>fourth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G1632>poured<s%> out his <S%G5357>vial<s%> on the <S%G2246>sun;<s%> and power was <S%G1325>given<s%> to him to <S%G2739>scorch<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> with <S%G4442>fire.<s%>

And <S%G444>men<s%> were <S%G2739>scorched<s%> with <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2738>heat,<s%> and <S%G987>blasphemed<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G5025>these<s%> <S%G4127>plagues:<s%> and they <S%G3340>repented<s%> not to <S%G1325>give<s%> him <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

And the <S%G3991>fifth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G1632>poured<s%> out his <S%G5357>vial<s%> on the <S%G2362>seat<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast;<s%> and his <S%G932>kingdom<s%> was full of <S%G4656>darkness;<s%> and they <S%G3145>gnawed<s%> their <S%G1100>tongues<s%> for <S%G4192>pain,<s%>

And <S%G987>blasphemed<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1537>because<s%> of their <S%G4192>pains<s%> and their <S%G1668>sores,<s%> and <S%G3340>repented<s%> not of their <S%G2041>deeds.<s%>

And the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G1632>poured<s%> out his <S%G5357>vial<s%> on the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4215>river<s%> <S%G2166>Euphrates;<s%> and the <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G846>thereof<s%> was <S%G3583>dried<s%> up, that the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G395>east<s%> might be <S%G2090>prepared.<s%>

And I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G944>frogs<s%> come out of the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of the <S%G1404>dragon,<s%> and out of the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> and out of the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of the <S%G5578>false<s%> <S%G5578>prophet.<s%>

For they are the <S%G4151>spirits<s%> of <S%G1142>devils,<s%> <S%G4160>working<s%> <S%G4592>miracles,<s%> which <S%G1607>go<s%> <S%G1607>forth<s%> to the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> and of the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3625>world,<s%> to <S%G4863>gather<s%> them to the <S%G4171>battle<s%> of that <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3841>Almighty.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> as a <S%G2812>thief.<s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is he that <S%G1127>watches,<s%> and <S%G5083>keeps<s%> his <S%G2440>garments,<s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> he <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G1131>naked,<s%> and they <S%G991>see<s%> his shame. <S%G808><s%>
And he <S%G4863>gathered<s%> them <S%G4863>together<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> in the <S%G1447>Hebrew<s%> <S%G1447>tongue<s%> <S%G717>Armageddon.<s%>

And the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G1632>poured<s%> out his <S%G5357>vial<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G109>air;<s%> and there <S%G1831>came<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> out of the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> from the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> It is <S%G1096>done.<s%>

And there were <S%G5456>voices,<s%> and <S%G1027>thunders,<s%> and <S%G796>lightning;<s%> and there was a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquake,<s%> <S%G3634>such<s%> as was not <S%G575>since<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G444>men<s%> were on the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G5082>so<s%> <S%G5082>mighty<s%> an <S%G4578>earthquake,<s%> and <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3173>great.<s%>

And the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> was <S%G1096>divided<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3313>parts,<s%> and the <S%G4172>cities<s%> of the <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G4098>fell:<s%> and <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G897>Babylon<s%> <S%G3415>came<s%> in <S%G3415>remembrance<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> to her the <S%G4221>cup<s%> of the <S%G3631>wine<s%> of the <S%G2372>fierceness<s%> of his <S%G3709>wrath.<s%>
And <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3520>island<s%> <S%G5343>fled<s%> away, and the <S%G3735>mountains<s%> were not <S%G2147>found.<s%>

And there <S%G2597>fell<s%> on <S%G444>men<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5464>hail<s%> out of <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> every stone <S%G5613>about<s%> the <S%G5006>weight<s%> of a <S%G5006>talent:<s%> and <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G987>blasphemed<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1537>because<s%> of the <S%G4127>plague<s%> of the <S%G5464>hail;<s%> for the <S%G4127>plague<s%> <S%G846>thereof<s%> was <S%G4970>exceeding<s%> <S%G3173>great.<s%>
